languages.text: {n}Джай надолго задумывается.{/n} "Пожалуй... я могла бы попробовать, шерин. По крайней мере, мысль о подобной перемене заставляет сердце в груди биться чаще, а кровь быстрее бежит по венам — и это ли не знак {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай надолго задумывается.{/n} "Пожалуй... я могла бы попробавть, шерин. По крайней мере, мысль о подобной перемене заставляет сердце в груди биться чаще, а гровь быстрее бежит по венам — и это ли не знак {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g}?"

languages.text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай надолго задумывается.{/n} "Пожалуй... я могла бы попробовать, шерин. По крайней мере, мысль о подобной перемене заставляет сердце в груди биться чаще, а кровь быстрее бежит по венам — и это ли не знак {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великого{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I guess... I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes the heart beat faster and the blood course swifter. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

{n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I guess... I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes the heart beat faster and the blood course swifter. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

{n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I suppose... I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

{n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I suppose... I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

{n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I suppose... I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

languages.text: {n}婕伊考虑了一会儿。{/n}“我猜……我可以试试看，亲爱的。至少一想到这样的变化，我的心跳就会加速，血管中的血液也会流得更快。我相信，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}肯定会给我个启示吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊考虑了一会儿。{/n}“我猜……我可以试试看，亲爱的。至少一想到这样的变化，我的心跳就会加速，血管中的血液也会流得更快。我相信，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}肯定会给我个启示吧？”

languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I suppose... I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the Exalted One is giving me a sign?"

languages.text: {n}Jae piensa durante un rato.{/n} «Supongo... que podría intentarlo, shereen. Al menos, la idea hace que mi corazón lata con fuerza y la sangre recorra mis venas con energía. ¿No será eso una señal del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae piensa durante un rato.{/n} «Supongo... que podría intentarlo, shereen. Al menos, la idea hace que mi corazón lata con fuerza y la sangre recorra mis venas con energía. ¿No será eso una señal del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g}?».

languages.text: {n}ジェイはしばらく考えこんだ。{/n}「そうだね…やってみるよ。少なくとも、この変化を考えると、心臓の鼓動が速くなり、血液の流れが速くなる。きっと、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}があたしに兆しをよこしてくれてるのかしら？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはしばらく考えこんだ。{/n}「そうだね…やってみるよ。少なくとも、この変化を考えると、心臓の鼓動が速くなり、血液の流れが速くなる。きっと、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}があたしに兆しをよこしてくれてるのかしら？」

languages.text: {n}Jae sinniert eine Weile darüber nach.{/n} "Nun ... Ich könnte es versuchen, Shereen. Zumindest lässt der Gedanke an diese Änderung mein Herz schneller schlagen und mein Blut schneller durch meine Venen fließen. Gewiss sendet der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} mir ein Zeichen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sinniert eine Weile darüber nach.{/n} "Nun ... Ich könnte es versuchen, Shereen. Zumindest lässt der Gedanke an diese Änderung mein Herz schneller schlagen und mein Blut schneller durch meine Venen fließen. Gewiss sendet der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} mir ein Zeichen?"

languages.text: {n}Jae prend un moment pour réfléchir à la question.{/n} « Je suppose... que je pourrais essayer, shereen. Au moins, la perspective de ce changement fait battre mon cœur plus vite. C'est certainement l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} qui m'envoie un signe, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae prend un moment pour réfléchir à la question.{/n} « Je suppose... que je pourrais essayer, shereen. Au moins, la perspective de ce changement fait battre mon cœur plus vite. C'est certainement l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} qui m'envoie un signe, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}Jae, bir süre düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "Sanırım deneyebilirim şirinim. Böyle bir değişiklik fikri bile kalbimin daha hızlı çarpmasına ve kanımın damarlarımda daha hızlı akmasına neden oldu. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} bana bir işaret gönderiyor olmalı muhakkak..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae considers it for a while.{/n} "I... suppose I could try, shereen. At least, the thought of this change makes my heart beat faster and my blood course more swiftly through my veins. Surely the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} is giving me a sign?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, bir süre düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "Sanırım deneyebilirim şirinim. Böyle bir değişiklik fikri bile kalbimin daha hızlı çarpmasına ve kanımın damarlarımda daha hızlı akmasına neden oldu. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} bana bir işaret gönderiyor olmalı muhakkak..."
